title: Implement smart path detection in smart-bootstrap.md
description: Enhance smart-bootstrap.md to accept relative paths (~/Documents/spec.md, ./spec.md, spec.md) and search common macOS locations when files aren't found. Add a 'recent files' helper that searches ~/Documents/, ~/Downloads/, ~/Desktop/, and iCloud Drive for recent .md files. This reduces friction with complex macOS paths, especially iCloud Drive paths.
notes: HIGH IMPACT - Phase 1 Quick Win. AUTO-COMPLETED: All 5 subtasks finished (5/5 done). Addresses 'Path Complexity on macOS' pain point. Implemented comprehensive smart path detection in smart-bootstrap.md: (1) Task 105: Relative path expansion (~/,./,..), (2) Task 106: Fallback search in Documents/Downloads/Desktop, (3) Task 107: iCloud Drive recursive search with download status checks, (4) Task 108: Recent files helper with interactive selection, (5) Task 109: Complete documentation in mac-user-workflow-guide.md. Users can now provide paths in any format and system automatically finds specs across all locations including iCloud. Eliminates need to type complex 80+ character iCloud paths.
user_benefit: Users can use simple relative paths or choose from recently modified .md files instead of typing complex absolute paths
